duties_responsibilities.duty: Build and maintain a network of sources to identify new sales leads.
Communicate with prospects to understand their needs and suggest products/services to meet those needs.
Demonstrate the functions and utility of products/services to various channel prospects and customers.
Ensure customer satisfaction through ongoing communication and relationship management.
Maintain detailed reports of sales activities, including calls, orders, and sales forecasts.
Identify and analyze customer preferences, provide feedback loops to improve the offering and market position.
Prospect for new business through personal lead generation across the U.S.
Develop relationships, secure new contracts, and meet/exceed established quotas.
Maintain updates in the CRM (HubSpot) system and report on pipeline status/goal adherence monthly.
Pitch the platform to appropriate stakeholders in organizations, primarily with self-funded health plans and related entities.
Attend networking functions, meetings, and conferences and participate in speaking engagements.
Create a seamless hand-off of the customer to the Customer Success Team once the contract is finalized.
Maintain relevant industry and technical knowledge by participating in development activities.
Contribute to the team effort and execute related results as needed.
Own the sales process from prospecting to contract negotiation.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Marketing, Sales, Business, or related field (Master's preferred)
